Strengths/Weaknesses: What are your strengths and weaknesses?
Goals/Achievement: Where do you see yourself in five years?
What are your long-term career goals?
Company: Why do you want to work for our company?
What do you know about our industry?
Pressure: Describe a situation where you had to work under pressure.
Can you provide an example of a time when you had to resolve a conflict?
Project/Development: Describe a successful project you were a part of and your role in it.
Time/Task Management: How do you prioritize your tasks and manage your time effectively?
Achievement/Goal: What do you consider to be your biggest professional achievement?
Learning/Technology: How do you stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in your field?
Tell me about a time when you had to learn a new skill quickly.
Conflict/Environment: Describe a time when you had to deal with a difficult coworker or customer.
How do you handle constructive criticism?
Technical: Can you explain a complex technical concept to someone with no technical background?
Interests/Likes/Hobbies: What do you like to do outside of work?
Differentiation/Self Assessment: What do you think sets you apart from other candidates?
Deadlines/Time Management: How do you handle tight deadlines?
Tell me about a time when you had to adapt to a significant change at work.
Organization/Categorize/Management: Describe a time when you had to lead a team.
Disagreements/Conflict: What would you do if you disagreed with your manager's decision?
How do you handle ambiguity or uncertainty in a project?
